Speaks coolly and firmly to maintain control and focus the group on their shared goal.

Carefully pushes aside the bulkhead, finds the dead attendant, replaces the blanket, and cautiously opens the elevator door.
Begins to cut the rivet heads from the floor using his shears after seeing the lift is above him.
Pulls himself silently along a cable to scout the cabin, carefully observing and reporting enemy positions.

Reports precise and useful information about the terrorists' numbers, weapons, and activities to the team via headset.
